get.summary: selects all advertisers

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: filter by id to fetch multiple items by id ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: extId
parameters.description: Filter by a set of external ids. Exact match only, no wildcards. Multiple results can still appear even for one id.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: filters by, case insensitive, use '%' for wildcards before/after

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: filters by, case insensitive, use '%' for wildcards before/after

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: filters by, numeric, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: userStarred
parameters.description: boolean check

parameters.name: syncTimestampAfter
parameters.description: filters by, date after the specified one (exclusive). Format is ISO-8601 with NO timezone: YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH[24]:MI:SS Example: '2017-12-12T15:43:33'

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Possible values: [+/-]id, [+/-]name, [+/-]city, [+/-]userStarred, [+/-]syncTimestamp

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
limit & offset: limit for items in the result list, and offset their result.
Limit is limited to 1000 max, defauled to 25.
Offset has no limit.
To know if there are more items in the next page, use the hasMore boolean property returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: filter by id to fetch multiple items by id ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: filters by, enumeration, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements): [ENTERED, VALIDATED, OUT_OF_MONEY, EXPIRED, ACTIVE, INVALID, RESERVED, PENDING, STARTING,STARTING_ERROR, UPDATING, UPDATING_ERROR, STOPPING, STOPPING_ERROR, HOLD]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: filters by, numeric, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: filters by, numeric, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: mediaType
parameters.description: filters by, enumeration, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements): [DISPLAY, VIDEO, MOBILE]

parameters.description: filters by, numeric, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: filters by, numeric, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: natureType
parameters.description: filters by, enumeration, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements): [STANDALONE, MASTER, FLIGHT, AGENCY]

parameters.name: salesUserId
parameters.description: filters by, numeric, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: placementId
parameters.description: filters by, numeric, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: filters by, numeric, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: websiteId
parameters.description: filters by, numeric, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
(For US/Oracle only) full text search: searches for complete words separated by space. 
By using the wildcard both before and after this special index will be used, but that could slow considerably the request compared to 'begins with', or even prevent it from returning any results, generating an error for too many terms in expansion. 
The error will be a http 422 + the relevant oracle response. 
With status:422 and code:20000 and traceId:51030, wildcard query expansion resulted in too many terms, need to type more characters. 
With status:422 and code:20000 and traceId:10599, no full text index is present/supported for the filtered column.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
(For US/Oracle only) full text search: searches for complete words separated by space. 
By using the wildcard both before and after this special index will be used, but that could slow considerably the request compared to 'begins with', or even prevent it from returning any results, generating an error for too many terms in expansion. 
The error will be a http 422 + the relevant oracle response. 
With status:422 and code:20000 and traceId:51030, wildcard query expansion resulted in too many terms, need to type more characters. 
With status:422 and code:20000 and traceId:10599, no full text index is present/supported for the filtered column.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
(For US/Oracle only) full text search: searches for complete words separated by space. 
By using the wildcard both before and after this special index will be used, but that could slow considerably the request compared to 'begins with', or even prevent it from returning any results, generating an error for too many terms in expansion. 
The error will be a http 422 + the relevant oracle response. 
With status:422 and code:20000 and traceId:51030, wildcard query expansion resulted in too many terms, need to type more characters. 
With status:422 and code:20000 and traceId:10599, no full text index is present/supported for the filtered column.

enableClickFraudLogging.description: Enable click fraud logging flag. Default set to false

active.description: Active flag. For create operation, is default set to true

type.description: filters by, enumeration, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements): [SALES, USER_TRACKING]

commissionType.description: filters by, enumeration, accepts multiple values ('in' condition, repeat parameter for multiple values up to 1000 elements): [FIXED, PERCENT]

masterId.description: the id of the master campaign to which this campaign belongs to, if it has one.

syncTimestamp.description: moment of last update of this entity

lastUpdate.description: moment of last update of this entity

createdAt.description: moment of creation of this entity

typeId.description: type of campaign. Identifier: the id list to be found elsewhere.

natureId.description: numeric value for the nature type.

natureType.description: nature type of campaign: [STANDALONE, MASTER, FLIGHT, AGENCY]

status.description: (legacy) status of campaign. Identifier: the id list to be found elsewhere.

statusName.description: (legacy) constant identifier for the status of a campaign. Post-processed field: cannot be filtered. Filter for status instead.

categoryId.description: category of campaign. Identifier: the id list to be found elsewhere. Also known as custom campaign type.

customerId.description: identifier of the customer of this campaign. Identifier: the id list to be found elsewhere.

customerName.description: identifier of the customer of this campaign. Name.

advertiserId.description: identifier of the advertiser of this campaign. Identifier: the id list to be found elsewhere.

advertiserName.description: identifier of the advertiser of this campaign. Name.

salesUserId.description: identifier of the user that..(that is what??). Identifier: the id list to be found elsewhere.

salesUserName.description: identifier of the user that..(that is what??). Name.

customSalesPerson.description: A person that can be specified by the user, free text field.

priority.description: priority of the campaign in respect of other campaigns: this is an ID value, not the value itself. for the value read priorityValue.

priorityValue.description: value of a priority of a campaign. Post-processed field: cannot be filtered/saved.

priorityName.description: constant identifier for the priority of a campaign. Post-processed field: cannot be filtered. Filter for priority instead.

paymentTypeId.description: type of payment. Identifier: the id list to be found elsewhere.

paymentTypeName.description: constant identifier for the payment type of a campaign. Post-processed field: cannot be filtered. Filter for paymentTypeId instead.

name.description: visual name identifier for the user

committed.description: if the banner push was finished and no other changes are pending.
if the banner push was finished and no other changes are pending.

advertiserId.description: Required on creation, cannot be used in updates. Advertiser owning the banner.

createdInCampaignId.description: created in campaign ID. It can be set only on create operation

elapsedTime.description: duration in milliseconds, elapsed live time of the campaign

remainingTime.description: duration in milliseconds, remaining live time of the campaign

nodeType.description: defines if operation(wrapper of statements in AND/OR), or operand(actual conditional statement)

operator.description: if nodeType=operation, use only AND/OR, otherwise the other values.

natureType.description: nature type of campaign: [STANDALONE, MASTER, FLIGHT, AGENCY]

advertiserId.description: identifier of the advertiser of this campaign.

customerId.description: identifier of the customer of this campaign.

dailyImpressionLimit.description: daily impression limit value. When the value is set to 0, no daily impression limit is applied

dailyClickLimit.description: daily click limit value. When the value is set to 0, no daily click limit is applied

impressionLimit.description: impression limit value. When the value is set to 0, no impression limit is applied

targetingId.description: this is the id to be used in the targeting formula for this key

typeId.description: Customer typeId.  One of typeId/type is required when creating a new one.

active.description: Active flag. For create operation is default set to true.

type.description: Customer type. One of typeId/type is required when creating a new one.

websiteId.description: Website reference (website id). Required on creation ONLY. Cannot be changed later.

active.description: Active flag. For create operation, is default set to true

inheritsMobileAppIds.description: Whether to inherit the mobile app ids or not

pageId.description: Page reference (page id). Required on creation ONLY. Cannot be changed later.

active.description: Active flag. For create operation, is default set to true

inheritsMobileAppIds.description: Whether to inherit the mobile app ids or not

active.description: Active flag. For create operation, is default set to true
